description: You only need 25 minutes to get steaming bowls of this fragrant chicken curry on the table. It's packed with flavour and the crispy roti hits the spot.
keywords: Curry,Egg free,Chicken dishes,Dinner Made Easy,Chicken,Sesame free
name: Cheatâ€™s Chicken Curry Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 700g Australian RSPCA approved chicken thigh fillet, fat trimmed, cut into 3cm pieces

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium heat. Add paste and cook for 1 minute, stirring, or until fragrant.
Add soup and 1/4 cup cream, then stir to combine. Bring to a simmer.
Add chicken and reduce heat to low. Simmer, covered, for 15 minutes or until chicken is cooked through.
Divide curry among bowls. Drizzle with remaining cream. Scatter over coriander and serve with roti.
